A Simple Bookmark Manager

A clean and simple interface to organize your favorite websites. Open a new browser tab now and see your sites load instantly. Try it for free.

Features

Our aim is to make it quick and easy for you to access your favorite websites. Your bookmarks sync between your devices so you can access them on the go.

Bookmark in one Click

Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface gives you complete contrl over how you manage your favorite sites

Intelligent Search

Our powerful search feature will help you find saved sites in no time at all. No need to trawl trough all your bookmarks.

Share your Bookmarks

Easily share your bookmarks and collection with others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.

Download the Extensions

We've got more browsers in the pipeline. please do let us know if you've got a favorite you'd like us to prioritize.
